txt_To_add_an_item_scan_its_barcode_or_t:
To add an item,
 scan its barcode or
 tap the Lookup By Number.
mess_Please_put_the_product_you_scanned_: Please put the product you scanned into the cart!
mess_First_take_the_barcode_of_the_produ: First, take the barcode of the product in front of the barcode scanner, then put it in the cart!
mess_You_cannot_add_or_subtract_products: You cannot add or subtract products to the cart during checkout!
txt_until_you_see_a_check_mark: until you see a check mark
txt_What_are_NFC_payments_NFC_technology:
What are NFC payments? NFC technology powers contactless payments via mobile wallets

 like Apple Pay and Google Pay, as well as contactless cards.
txt_Please_scan_the_Loyalty_card_or_Ente: Please scan the Loyalty card or Enter Loyalty Code
txt_Stop_and_remove_the_product_from_the: Stop and remove the product from the cart.
txt_After_see_the_window_scan_its_barcod: After see the window, scan its barcode of the selected product to remove.
txt_If_you_are_sure_to_remove_the_produc: If you are sure to remove the product, press the confirmation button.

txt_scan_its_barcode_of_the_selected_pro: scan its barcode of the selected product.

txt_Continue_after_you_hear_the_notifica: Continue after you hear the notification sound.
txt_Make_sure_the_cart_is_empty: Make sure the cart is empty.

txt_Add_or_remove_products_one_by_one: Add or remove products one by one.
